title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Combine pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture quickly and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked.
Prepare masala sauce with tomato puree and cream.
Add chicken to the sauce and simmer.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
